Erik Weihenmayer lives in the United States.

Morocco is a country in North Africa.

Grand Canyon is a huge valley in the United States.

Everest is the highest mountain in the world.

Erik cannot see.

He also helps people with disabilities.  
He wants them to live active lives.  

He leads groups of young people who cannot see on climbing trips.
